text:
@realDonaldTrump WHY DO YOU LIE TO YOUR FOLLOWERS?

HOW MANY OF YOUR FOLLOWERS ARE GOING TO GET COVID-19 BECAUSE THEY BELIEVE YOU?

YOUR HURTING YOUR PEOPLE!

BUT I KNOW YOU DON'T GIVE A SHIT ABOUT ANYONE BUT YOURSELF.

THE PITTY THE FOOLS WHO FOLLOW YOU!

MIS-LEADER - AND YOUR PROUD OF IT!
